As a portable charger for electronic devices, allowing users to charge their devices on-the-go and in remote locations where access to electrical outlets is limited.
As a makeshift clothesline for hanging laundry, providing an eco-friendly alternative to using electric dryers and reducing energy consumption.
As a creative and space-saving storage solution for small living spaces, by connecting multiple power strips together to create a longer surface for hanging clothes and other items.
As a makeshift air freshener, by placing a few drops of essential oils on a power strip and plugging it into an outlet to diffuse the scent throughout the room.
As a temporary repair for damaged electronics, by using a power strip to supply power to a damaged device and potentially reviving it.
